column6: Captain George Stacy has discovered Peter Parker's secret, but he's willing to keep it to himself in return for a favor. The mysterious duo known as Cloak & Dagger have come to town, and since they're way beyond the average beat cop's ability to take down, Spider-Man has a choice: simply place himself in mortal danger, fighting two foes with unknown powers, or take off the mask. All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Matteo Lolli | penciller:Skottie Young | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Chris Sotomayor | writer:Paul Tobin | inker:Christian Dalla Vecchia
